attributes.action: To Incorporate Joey Dunlops name into  the Belfast International Airport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Joe Dunlop was with out doubt Northern Irelands greatest sportsman and ambassador ever. His sportsmanship,charity work and professsionalism was known worldwide.He was a very unassuming man despite his many sporting triumphs and awards from Her Majesty The Queen.
He was loved  and respected by all who met him at home and abroad,regardless of race or creed.The greatest honour we can bestow on this sporting legend would be to name the Belfast International Airport after him.He was truly the greatest sportsman ever to come out of Northern Ireland.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
